title: Motion of a car from velocity table and graph part - c

content.description: The graph of the velocity v(t), in ft/sec, of a car traveling on a straight road, for 0 ≤ t ≤ 50, is shown above. A table of values for v(t), at 5 second intervals of time t, is shown to the right of the graph
content.question: Find one approximation for the acceleration of the car, in ft/sec2, at t = 40. Show the computations you used to arrive at your answer.

frqParts.text: Find one approximation for the acceleration of the car, in ft/sec2, at t = 40. Show the computations you used to arrive at your answer.

topic.text: 2.3: Estimating Derivatives of a Function at a Point

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
